strings.evolution:
This light will lead me to greatness!
I have the power to crush the dark!
strings.affinity:
For as long as you do not lose
sight of the light, I will stand
at your side. Onward!
strings.description: A great hero sung of in tales from a distant world and one of the legendary warriors who, with the blessing of the crystals, did battle with the shadows. Setting off on a quest to restore the Crystals' shine, he and his companions learn of the existence of Chaos, the demon shrouding the world in darkness. The four fiends that eventually spring from Chaos are vanquished by the Warriors of Light, who then confront the perpetrator of all this turmoil by traveling 2,000 years into the past.
strings.fusion:
As long as there's light, I will fight!
Whatever obstacles may lie ahead,
I'll ne'er stop, until I'm dead!
strings.summon:
I have no name or memories.
However, I have the will to move forward.
Let us cut a path forward.

strings.evolution:
I feel new powers awakening...
Is this a gift from the dragon king?
strings.affinity:
For as long as you do not lose
sight of the light, I will stand
at your side. Onward!
strings.description: A great hero sung of in tales from a distant world. A legendary warrior who, with the blessing of the crystals, did battle with the shadows and saved the world. Arriving in the land of Cornelia, they saved Princess Sarah from the clutches of the rogue knight Garland, the first step in a journey which would see them restore light to the crystals. In listening to the tales of the people in the lands they explored, they gradually uncovered the true nature of the darkness that threatened the realm.
strings.fusion:
I must grow stronger, that we
may at last break free from
the bonds of chaos!
strings.summon:
A world threatened by the darkness...?
Yes, this shall be my new battlefield!

strings.affinity:
For as long as you do not lose
sight of the light, I will stand
at your side. Onward!
strings.description: A great hero sung of in tales from a distant world. One of the warriors of light whose coming was foretold in the prophecies of old. The four warriors of light arrived in the land of Cornelia, each bearing a crystal that had lost its light, and with no memories to speak of. In time, they realized that the crystals they held were inextricably linked to the four elements that sustained their world, and set off on a journey to instill them with light anew.
strings.fusion:
Until the crystals shine bright
once more, I shall not
abandon my quest!
strings.summon:
Is it the crystals that guide me here?
No matter, my strength shall be yours!
